mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (count, id, title, contents, writer, passwd, deleteYn, createdDate, modifiedDate) VALUES (#{count}, #{id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{passwd}, #{deleteYn}, NOW(), NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT count, id, title, contents, writer, passwd, deleteYn, createdDate, modifiedDate FROM tbl_board ORDER BY createdDate
